description: 8th grade student reading 2-3 years below grade level with limited academic vocabulary

vocabulary.rule: Flag tier 2/3 terms without explicit definition or visual support

severity_thresholds.low: All terms defined but lacking visual supports

pacing.rule: Flag activities longer than 20 min without clear break points

severity_thresholds.medium: 20-30 min activity without explicit break points

scaffolding.rule: Flag production tasks (writing, speaking) without models or sentence frames

severity_thresholds.high: Complex writing (essay, analysis) without any scaffolding
severity_thresholds.medium: Writing task with partial scaffolding (example OR frames, not both)
severity_thresholds.low: Adequate scaffolding but could be enhanced

instructions.rule: Flag tasks with >3 steps without checklist or visual

severity_thresholds.medium: 4 steps without checklist or complex multi-step task
severity_thresholds.low: 3 steps but could benefit from visual organization
